word:
I am glad that you [S. N. Haskell and wife] are carrying forward the work you have undertaken in San Bernardino. I believe that you are working in harmony with the light that has been given to me. In your work you come in contact with people who need to feel a hunger and thirst after righteousness. The Lord's blessing will be with all who work in harmony with His plans.-- Letter 192, 1906, p. 2. (To S. N. Haskell and wife, June 8, 1906.) 


                                    -404-
